title: Nee Kavithaigala Lyrics Maragadha Naanayam
stanzas:
Mugam kaattu nee
muzhu venpani
oadaathe nee yen ellaiyae.
idhazhoramaai siru punnagai
nee kaattadi en mullaiye.

mazhaiyodu nanaiyum
pudhu paadam neethaan.
azhagaana thimirae.
adiye adiye kaattrodu
paravum un vaasam
thinamum pudhu bothaithaane
silaiyae azhage.
azhage...

naan unakkenave
mudhal pirandhen
ilangodiye
nee enakkenave
karam virithaai
en varamae.

mandhaara poopola
machcham kaanum vela
ennatha naan solla
michcham onnum illa

muzhu venpani
oadaathe nee yen ellaiyae.
idhazhoramaai siru punnagai
nee kaattadi en mullaiye.

muzhu venpani
oadaathe nee, yen ellaiyae.
idhazhoramaai
siru punnagai
